feedback_summary: 800ms latency unacceptable for production. AI gave incorrect refund info costing $12K. No guardrails. No SOC 2. Switched to Amazon Connect.
Procurement rejected us without SOC 2. Latency was also a concern. Moved to ElevenLabs.
Voice clone quality changed after model update. Two months of asking for a fix. Gave up and switched.
Security review rejected us. No SOC 2, no data residency options, unclear AI data handling. Went to Resemble.
Latency issues caused customer complaints at scale. Voice agent couldn't handle interruptions. Despite best voice quality we've tested, enterprise readiness too low.
Model update changed my voice clone. Felt like creators were being ignored for enterprise. Friend recommended ElevenLabs.
Compliance team killed the deal after POC. No SOC 2, no HIPAA path, no SLAs. Defaulted to Google.
Paused Soundscape after Universal Music news. Too risky for our game's soundtrack. Will reconsider if legal is resolved.
Voice agent response time was 900ms. Agent gave wrong product information twice. Lost confidence in AI reliability.
Latency and lack of response guardrails. Agent told customer incorrect policy info. No way to restrict agent responses.
Our CISO vetoed the deployment. No SOC 2, no data processing agreement, no incident response SLA. Moved to Amazon Connect despite inferior voice quality.
